amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to allow the Veterans Administration to benefit from Maximum Fair Pricing guidelines.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows the Department of Veterans Affairs to benefit from Maximum Fair Pricing guidelines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 192 (Roll no. 680).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 192 (Roll no. 680).
